title: Fix login bug
body:
The login form breaks when the password contains special characters like `<` and `>`.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to /login
2. Enter password with `<script>` tag
3. Submit

Expected: Error message
Actual: 500 error

title: Add dark mode support
body:
It would be great to have a dark mode toggle in the settings page.

Design mockup attached.

title: Performance regression in dashboard API
body:
After upgrading to v2.3, the /api/dashboard endpoint takes 5 seconds to respond instead of 200ms.

Profiler output shows N+1 query in the user stats aggregation.

```sql
SELECT * FROM user_stats WHERE user_id = ? -- called 500 times!
```

This should be a single batch query:

```sql
SELECT * FROM user_stats WHERE user_id IN (?, ?, ...)
```
